705538f-a.title: Brooklyn: MacDougal Street - Stone Avenue
705538f-a.text:
MacDougal Street and Stone Avenue, n.e. cor., Brooklyn.
P. L. Sperr, photographer
Aug. 3, 1941
Neg. No. A-1116
705538f-a.folder: MacDougal Street & Stone Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

706913f-a.title: Brooklyn: Stone Avenue - MacDougal Street
706913f-a.text:
Stone Avenue, north from MacDougal Street to Broadway.
The W. P. A. is conducting a sewer project here. On
Broadway (background) is the eleva'ed of the B. M. T.
subway.
Hay 20, 1936
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE
